HomeText: Available to play vs CPU, Local Versus and Online
You are currently in a tournament.
AboutT1: This website is the result of the final project in the common core at 42 school, ft_transcendence.
AboutT2: It is built using HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, React, Django, and PostgreSQL.
AboutT3: The source code for this website is available on
PlayDescriptionNotLoggedIn: Grab a friend, pull up a chair, and decide who's the better miniponger once and for all.
AdditionalTextNotLoggedIn: If you want to play a tournament or have your scores saved, you need to log in or create a profile first.
PlayDescriptionMultiplayer: Grab a friend, pull up a chair, and decide who's the better miniponger once and for all.
AdditionalTextMultiplayer: You can check your stats on your profile.
PlayDescriptionTournament: Create a tournament with total of 4 players and battle it out to find the ultimate champion.
AdditionalTextTournament: Find 3 people and find out who is the best in pong.
Are you sure you want to leave?: Are you sure you want to leave?
This means you will officially lose the: This means you will officially lose the tournament match and you can't come back to this tournament.
This means you will officially end the t: This means you will officially end the tournament.
You need to set up Mobile Authenticator: You need to set up Mobile Authenticator to activate your account.
Install one of the following application: Install one of the following applications on your mobile:
Open the application and scan the barcod: Open the application and scan the barcode:
Enter the one-time code provided by the: Enter the one-time code provided by the application and click Submit to finish the setup.
User not found: User not found, you have to register first

We couldn't find the page you're looking: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It may have been moved, or the URL might be incorrect. Please check the link or return to the homepage.
You are not authorized to access this pa: You are not authorized to access this page. Please log in with the correct credentials or contact support if you believe this is an error.
Oops! Something went wrong on our side. We’re working on it. Please try again later, or reach out to support if the issue persists.
There's an issue with one of our servers: There's an issue with one of our servers. Please try again in a few moments. If the problem continues, contact support.
The server took too long to respond. Ple: The server took too long to respond. Please check your connection or try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.
The request took too long to process. Pl: The request took too long to process. Please check your internet connection or try submitting your request again. If this issue continues, please contact support.
